thread.section_title: Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, very clean
thread.title_full: Good location, very clean - Review of Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: NfezzahH
title: Good location, very clean
text:
Was in Paris on the 28-31 Jan 2017 and we stayed in this clean and convenient aparthotel. The room was very spacious for 2 pax and our luggages. We had the room with an eiffel tower view which was reallyyy nice at night.
The room has a king size bed, a small kitchen area, utensils and microwave. So if you guys wanna save money for shopping and cook in the apartment, this is one of the aparthotel that i will recommend.
Macdonalds is just at the bottom of the apartment. And metro station is just a seconds walk. Really convenient. To travel to Eiffel, Louvre, PSG stadium, Champ Elsees is accessible too.
There's a 24 hours convenient store about 2 minutes walk from the apartment to get your groceries.
Highly recommended especially for girls who think of their safety while in Paris. 24hours receptionist also available. And to enter the apartment, you will need an access card.
A highly recommended accomodation.
